# Theme weeks

Theme weeks occupy a whole week with a single topic, with 10-20 events scheduled on the topic. This year, we'll run theme weeks as follows:

## 2026

+ week commencing 9th March 2026: [mistakes and errors](tw/mistakes_week_2026.qmd)
+ week commencing 20th April 2026: KIND careers
+ week commencing 22th June 2026: the history of health data and analytics
+ week commencing 26th October 2026: KIND and research
